title: Transferring the Ownership of Houses in the Housing Complex situated at Mahawela Lane, Dematagoda, to the Occupants
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. Rauff Hakeem, the Minister of Urban Development, Water Supply and Drainage, to execute the deeds of transfer in favour of 21 occupants reside at the above housing complex, who have completed the payment of the prescribed value of their housing units, was approved by the Cabinet.
